short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plays a familiar brief music clip whenever you click on a Remember Me check box on a web form

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Plays a familiar brief music clip whenever you click on a Remember Me check box on a web form.

This does not work in all instances due to web developers using different names for the Remember check box, but it does work with most.

Made specifically by request for @Nick_Mudry
